name: Search Algorithm Visualization
description: This is a web-based application that visualizes the search algorithms. The application is developed using ReactJS
features: Provides interactive visualizations for search algorithms like BFS, DFS, Dijkstra, and A*.
Users can create customizable grids with adjustable parameters such as diagonal movement and weights.
Displays performance statistics like execution time, memory usage, and visited nodes.
A built-in user manual explains the algorithms and how to use the tool.

name: Artificial Kinetic Intelligence system
description: Welcome to the Artificial Kinetic Intelligence system, where advanced data analysis and intelligent decision-making meet. Explore insights, power your projects, and achieve remarkable outcomes with our AI-driven tools.
features: It is built using Streamlit, a Python framework for data applications.
The site requires JavaScript to be enabled to function properly.
It appears to host an interactive application, but its exact purpose is unclear.
Without JavaScript, the application remains inaccessible.
